findings.details: Hero and contact blocks use consistent spacing and responsive chips; no critical overflow found in templates reviewed.
External URLs were enumerated, but network checks are disabled in this run.
Custom font stack in CSS relied on local availability; add explicit webfont loading to ensure consistent typography across devices.
Key pages and posts include description/keywords; structured data is present in layouts.

recommendations: Load the primary PT Sans/PT Serif/Alegreya fonts explicitly to stabilize typography across devices
Re-run external link validation when network checks are available
